parameter.name: notes
parameter.value: =Note : We must be notified 2 hours before dispatch in order to generate ASN and Tax invoices, which are required for goods receipt and without which materials will not be allowed inside the Material gate by security. For Order Dispatch Related queries E-mail to: vedantaiob.ops@shakedeal.com

parameter.name: terms
parameter.value:
=Terms & Conditions
Price basis : FOR - Free on Road
FOR SITE
Insurance :
Taxes : GST Extra @ Actuals
Shipping Instruction : OP COMMERCE INVOICE HAS TO BE ATTACHED TO PRODUCT.
Payment mode : NEFT/RTGS
Payment terms : 30 Days Credit

Warranty : The equipment's/spares supplied to us under this Contract shall be warranted against defects in workmanship and material under normal use, service and duty conditions as specified in the Purchase Order, for a period of 12 months from the date of installation or 18 months from the date of supply, whichever is earlier. If any defects are noticed in the equipment during the warranty period, the same shall be intimated to you in writing and the equipment will be sent to you on a freight-to-pay basis. All rectification/replacement will be undertaken at your own cost.

LD clause # Applicable as below
LD Clause: In the event you fail to supply the material within the time specified in the contract, you shall pay to us penalty @ 0.5% of the value of the contract for each weeks delay and part thereof. However, such payment shall not exceed 5% of the total value of the contract. We may, without prejudice to any other method of recovery, deduct an amount of such damages from any monies due or which may become due to you.

OP Commerce Pvt. Ltd. is an aggregator in Procurement & Stores sector for Vedanta Ltd.
For Vendor payments we solely depend on payments received from Vedanta Ltd. post adherence to all procurement and billing procedures. Only on receipt of actual payment from Vedanta Ltd.; we release our payments to vendors for material supplied as per the terms and conditions mentioned in this Purchase Order. 

Thus , unless and otherwise different payment procedures are specified in this agreement, this order will be covered under conditional payment clause of “Paid-if-Paid”. It is expressly agreed that AGGREGATOR (Opcommerce Online Private Limited) doesn’t have any payment liability unless it receives the payment from Vedanta Ltd. (Purchase Entity / Principal Buyer)

parameters.subject: =Purchase Order from Opcommerce Online Pvt. Ltd. for Vedanta (Purchase Order #: {{$node["create po"].json["purchaseorder"]["purchaseorder_number"]}})
parameters.html:
=


Dear Sir/ Madam,

 

Please find attached herewith Purchase order for supply of mentioned material to our Client M/s Vedanta, {{$node["Get po_details"].json["data"][0]["po_items"][0]["plant"]}} Plant. Request you to kindly go through the attached PO and provide your confirmation on price, terms, conditions, and delivery timeline by accepting the same.

 

You will be contacted by our representative (POC Name - {{$node["Get po_details"].json["data"][0]["operation_agent"]["first_name"]}}, POC Email - {{$node["Get po_details"].json["data"][0]["operation_agent"]["email"]}}) from Operations team for co-ordination w.r.t material delivery, invoice provision and other assistance related to this supply.

 

 

 


http://shakedeal.com/

OP COMMERCE ONLINE PVT LTD 

DEDICATED PURCHASING PARTNER FOR:


​

Terms and conditions

  • In rare instances, if you have any concerns with respect to this, please reach out to us immediately.

  • We must be notified 4 hours before dispatch in order to generate ASN and Tax invoices, which are required for goods receipt and without which materials will not be allowed inside the Material gate by security. For order dispatch related queries E-mail to: vedantaiob.ops@shakedeal.com

  • Consignment should go only with OP commerce invoice.

  • For all other Terms and Conditions please refer our attached Purchase Order.

​
